name: Final Minutes
description:
In this Tower Defense strategy game, team up with an A.I to destroy enemies and save the compound. Defeat the Drones, Demolishers, Spiders, Rovers, and if you can survive long enough, come face to face with the biggest force on the planet... The Annihilators.

How long can you survive?

Created by EpicBettaFish and LeftyAtHeart

LeftyAtHeart - https://www.youtube.com/c/LeftyAtHeart

EpicBettaFish (currently hasn't uploaded yet) -https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3zz1_-uLzmax5xUkWEu4uw

Made for the Wowie 4.0 Game Jam
